Daniel Lew - Android developer

ABSTRACT
In this talk we'll go over how to write the best layouts for your application. We'll cover a range of improvements including choosing the right ViewGroup, effectively leveraging resource qualifiers, avoiding code duplication, and more tips and tricks. [...]
